title: November 9, 2010 3PM
content:
Health Issues: Arthritis, B vitamins, O3FA; B vitamins & brain; high protein diet. Andrew Gavin Marshall is a... <!--more--> Research Associate with the Center for Research on Globalization in Montreal, Quebec.
A scholar in political economics & history, Andrew is a co-editor with his colleague Prof.
Michel Chossudovsky of the volume “The Global Economic Crisis: The Great Depression of the Twenty-First Century.
” His forthcoming book will focus on the emergence of a global governance through the merger of government and corporate finance.
The engineering of a global governance structure by instigating global depression.
www.globalresearch.ca
